name: Flappy Dragon (DragonRuby)
description:
This is a simple Flappy Bird clone we wrote to show how to knock out a game quickly with DragonRuby Game Toolkit. This is 209 lines of Ruby code and a handful of PNG, OGG, and WAV files.

Press the spacebar to flap!

(Artwork and audio for Flappy Dragon created by Nick Culbertson. Thanks!)
